weka.classifiers.meta

Class AutoWEKAClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.meta.AutoWEKAClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer, weka.core.BatchPredictor, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.CapabilitiesIgnorer, weka.core.CommandlineRunnable, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.RevisionHandler

    public class AutoWEKAClassifier
extends weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
implements weka.core.AdditionalMeasureProducer
    Auto-WEKA interface for WEKA. * @author Lars Kotthoff
    See Also:
